hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
